casebody.data:
HOME BUILDERS ASSOCIATION OF FAYETTEVILLE NORTH CAROLINA, INC., James Edward Graves, Jim Graves & Associates, Inc., John McNatt Gillis, Gillis Development Corporation, Inc., et al.
v.
CITY OF FAYETTEVILLE. No. 366P05. Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2005. Garris Neil Yarborough, for Home Builders. Karen McDonald, City Attorney, Anthony Fox, Charlotte, Benjamin R. Sullivan, Brenton W. McConkey, for City of Fayetteville.

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed on the 12th day of July 2005 by Plaintiffs in this matter for discretionary review of the decision of the North Carolina Court of Appeals pursuant to G.S. 7A-31, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the North Carolina Court of Appeals:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th day of August 2005."

Justice BRADY recused.
